org.overture.interpreter

Class VDMJ

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.overture.interpreter.VDMJ
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    VDMPP, VDMSL

    public abstract class VDMJ
extends Object
    The main class of the VDMJ parser/checker/interpreter.

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(String[] args)
        The main method. This validates the arguments, then parses and type checks the files provided (if any), and finally enters the interpreter if required.
        Parameters:
        args - Arguments passed to the program.

      • parse

        public abstract ExitStatus parse(List<File> files)
        Parse the list of files passed. The value returned is the number of syntax errors encountered.
        Parameters:
        files - The files to parse.
        Returns:
        The number of syntax errors.

      • typeCheck

        public abstract ExitStatus typeCheck()
        Type check the files previously parsed by parse(List). The value returned is the number of type checking errors.
        Returns:
        The number of type check errors.

      • getInterpreter

        public abstract Interpreter getInterpreter()
                                    throws Exception
        Generate an interpreter from the classes parsed.
        Returns:
        An initialized interpreter.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • interpret

        protected abstract ExitStatus interpret(List<File> filenames,
                                        String defaultName)
        Interpret the type checked specification. The number returned is the number of runtime errors not caught by the interpreter (usually zero or one).
        Parameters:
        filenames - The filenames currently loaded.
        defaultName - The default module or class (or null).
        Returns:
        The exit status of the interpreter.

      • dumpLogs

        protected void dumpLogs()
        Dump log files
